metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6802 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.2. There is a potential heap-based buffer over-read on incoming Compressed RTF Streams, related to DecompressRTF() in libytnef.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.5-9ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-9ubuntu0.1').
